ComicInfo.Title: The Dorks of Hazzardous with Chipps to Go; If Women Really Want to Be Treated Equally...; Cracked Fantasies; You're Not Going to Get Anywhere With Him/Her If...; What You're Really Thinking; Cracked Visits the Ol' Fishing Creek; Cracked's All-Purpose, Time-Saving "Denial of Charges" Speech for Politicians; The Cracked Penal Code; What "Help Wanter" Ads Say and What They Really Mean!; Loser, the Magazine for Deadbeats; Cracked Songs from Outer Space; Ye Hang Ups; Jimmy Carter's Telethon for Energy; Shut-Ups!
ComicInfo.Summary:
A satire of the televsion shows THE DUKES OF HAZZARD and CHIPS.
Do-it-yourself political speech.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:38:57. [Issue ID 250533]

ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin,Don Orehek,Su Gumen,Warren Sattler,Howard Nostrand,John Langton,Catherine Severin,Sam Whitehead
